```{r New columns of event boundaries} 
DHOmarked <- read.csv(file = "thesis/emoDHOFinal_eventMarked.csv", header = T, sep = ",", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
str(DHOmarked)
begin_row <- 1
end_row <- 1
total_row <- nrow(DHOmarked)
while (end_row <= total_row) {
  if  (is.na(DHOmarked$marker_event[end_row]))
  end_row <- end_row+1
}
```
